text: Suresh Bhattarai is a Nepalese physicist and astrophysicist who is a physics lecturer at the Department Of Physics at Tri-Chandra Multiple Campus and also is the Current Chairperson Of Nepal Astronomical Society (NASO). == Education and career == Suresh attended the Sanskrit Secondary School (Nepal Sanskrit University) in 2002, the Amrit Science College (Tribhuvan University) in 2004 for S.L.C and I.Sc respectively. He then went on to Balmeeki Vidyapeeth (Nepal Sanskrit University) in 2005 for a Uttar Madhyama. He majored B.Sc. Physics in Tri-Chandra College (Tribhuvan University) in 2007. He obtained a M.Sc. in 2011 from St. Xavier's College (Tribhuvan University) majoring Astrophysics and Plasma. == Books/ Publications == === Refereed Journal === * The ethical aspect of scientific interest in selected physical theories *On the dynamics of moving single bubble sonoluminescence *Study of NGC2070 at 3-8 Kev and 8-20 Kev using RXTE Survey *Impact of Meteor Science Outreach in Nepal *Impact Of Astronomy In Nepalese Civilization *Visual Observation of Meteors in Nepal *Promoting astronomy for the development of society in Nepal == Awards and Grants == * Space Generation Advisory Council Young Leadership Award 2011 * IAU/OAD, Project grant for ‘Developing Astronomical Skills in Nepal’, 2018 *Nepal Academy Of Science And Technology (NAST)Science and technology promotion award 2017 == Organizations Involved In == * Nepal Astronomical Society (NASO) Chairperson * Space Generation Advisory Council (SGAC)Regional Co-ordinator Asia Pacific * EurAstro Association Chairman- EurAstro World * International Year Of Astronomy 2009 (IYA 2009) Resource Person (2009-2010) *International Astronomical Union (IAU) National Outreach Co-ordinator for Nepal (2018- 2021) *Nationa == References == Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Astrophysicists Category:Astronomers Category:Nepalese people
